info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:01PM PDT until August 24 at 3:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM PDT FOR WEST CENTRAL CLARK COUNTY... At 300 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Spring Mountain Ranch, or near Red Rock Canyon, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees. Locations impacted include... Blue Diamond, Red Rock Canyon, Rocky Gap Campground, Mountain Springs, Lovell Canyon Campground, Spring Mountain Ranch and Mt. Potosi. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
